name: Smartworks
description: Smartworks is India's largest managed workspace platform with a growing footprint of over 8 million sq. ft. across 40+ locations in 14 cities. The company caters to more than 550 organisations including Forbes 2000 /Fortune 500 companies, global MNCs and established unicorns/soonicorns. Smartworks is reimagining the workspaces and redefining the office experience for millions of officegoers. With the seamless integration of physical and digital platforms, we enable enterprises and their employees to access various products and services to achieve optimum productivity. In keeping with our mission, "Workspaces that work for you," we strive to provide businesses with the best environment to focus on their core business while ensuring employee happiness and productivity.
features: Your vision is at the forefront of our design solutions.
Headline: India's Largest Managed Workspace Platform
ShortDescription: Smartworks India’s leading Managed and Flexible office space provider to Large enterprises, SMEs and high- growth startups.
enhanced_description: Smartworks is India's largest managed workspace platform, redefining the office experience across over 8 million sq. ft. in 40+ locations across 14 cities. Catering to a diverse clientele including Forbes 2000 /Fortune 500 companies, global MNCs, established unicorns/soonicorns, Large enterprises, SMEs, and high-growth startups, Smartworks offers a seamless integration of physical and digital platforms. This enables enterprises and their employees to access various products and services, fostering optimum productivity, employee happiness, and allowing businesses to focus on their core operations.
key_use_cases: Providing managed and flexible office spaces
Redefining and enhancing the office experience for employees
Integrating physical and digital workspace solutions for productivity
Enabling businesses to focus on core operations by managing workspace needs
Improving employee happiness and productivity through workspace environment
competitive_advantages: India's largest managed workspace platform by footprint (8M+ sq. ft.)
Extensive network across 40+ locations in 14 cities
Caters to a wide range of organizations including Forbes 2000/Fortune 500, global MNCs, unicorns/soonicorns, large enterprises, SMEs, and high-growth startups
Seamless integration of physical and digital platforms
Strong focus on design solutions and hospitality
roi_benefits: Enable businesses to focus on their core operations
scalability_features: Extensive footprint with over 8 million sq. ft. across 40+ locations in 14 cities, demonstrating large-scale operations and capacity for growth.
